Koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, "Prybuvayutʹ do yakoho BOHA vidkryly, ta do kur'yera," vy bachyte , shcho lytsemiry unykaye vas povnistyu
Yak tse bude koly yim udariv lykha, yak naslidok yikh volodiyutʹ bude pratsyuye? Vony prybudutʹ do vas todi ta prysyahayete BOHOM: "Nashi namiry buly harni ta spravedlyvyy
BOH znaye tsilkom yikhni nayhlybshi namiry. Vy budete proihnoruvaty yikh, budete vysvitlyty yikh, ta budete daty yim harnu poradu shcho mozhete vryatuvaty yikhni dushi
